sentence.Network_en: The guilty criminal got a lifer, he was sentenced to forty years in prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个罪犯肯定要在监狱里面待很久了, 他被判刑四十年.

sentence.Network_en: My dream job is to be a lifer on a famous television show.
sentence.Network_cn: 我梦想的工作是能够在一个有名的电视节目里面工作一辈子.

sentence.Network_en: Daniel Sparks, the Houston - born Goldman lifer who ran the mortgage department, usually arrived by a.m.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时在该部门工作的人士说, 抵押贷款部门负责人丹尼尔?斯帕克斯(DanielSparks)通常在早上7:30之前就来到办公室.

entry.def: A lifer is a criminal who has been given a life sentence.

means.word_mean: 1. a prisoner serving a term of life imprisonment
